key.name: countdown
key.description: Set to True to show countdown when taking a photo

key.name: flash
key.summary: Fire flash before taking a picture
key.description: Set to True to fire a flash before taking a picture

key.name: camera
key.description: The device which points to the camera (e.g. /dev/video0)

key.name: selected-effect
key.description: Name of installed effect that was selected last

key.name: photo-x-resolution
key.description: The width resolution of the image captured from the camera

key.name: photo-y-resolution
key.description: The height resolution of the image captured from the camera

key.name: video-x-resolution
key.description: The width resolution of the video captured from the camera

key.name: video-y-resolution
key.description: The height resolution of the video captured from the camera

key.name: brightness
key.description: Adjusts brightness level of the picture coming from the camera

key.name: contrast
key.description: Adjusts contrast level of the picture coming from the camera

key.name: saturation
key.description: Adjusts saturation level of the picture coming from the camera

key.name: hue
key.description: Adjusts hue level of the picture coming from the camera

key.name: video-path
key.description: Defines the path where the videos are stored. If empty, "XDG_VIDEO/Webcam" will be used.

key.name: photo-path
key.description: Defines the path where the photos are stored. If empty, "XDG_PHOTO/Webcam" will be used.

key.name: wide-mode
key.summary: Whether to start in wide mode
key.description: If set to true, Cheese will start up in a wide mode with the image collection placed on the right-hand side. Useful with small screens.

key.name: fullscreen
key.description: If set to true, Cheese will start up in a fullscreen mode.

key.name: burst-delay
key.summary: Time between photos in burst mode
key.description: The length of time, in milliseconds, to delay between taking each photo in a burst sequence of photos.

key.name: burst-repeat
key.summary: Number of photos in burst mode
key.description: The number of photos to take in a single burst.
